name: Xmas Ludo
description:
Ludo is one of the most popular board and dice games in many counties. The Xmas Ludo is for Christmas Holidays, support "Team Mode" creatively, you can play together with friends in one team against others in another team. Also you can 1 vs 3 if you like!

* More than 10 kinds of Xmas icons.
* Change game background, also you can select photos from Camera Roll.
* Lucky Draw after each game, get free Magic Dices.
* Team Mode.
* New rule 'Team Push' : the pieces in the same team can push forward each other when they fall into one grid.
* Enhanced AI design.
* Statistics.

How to play?
* Each player has 4 pieces start in the base.
* Roll the dice to move each piece around the board.
* Piece will jump if stop at the grid has the same color with the piece.
* Piece will kick other pieces back to base if stop at the grid that other places already stopped at. The pieces in the same team do not kick each other.
* All pieces reach the goal in one team firstly, the team win.
